title: cant login my main account
body: i have 2 accounts, this smurf one works just fine i can login everything but my main account with all my skins and champs cant log in, saying its the wrong password when i use the same password for both accounts. changing pw doesnt work, does someone know the issue of this? my main account ign is "sayIT"

replies.body:
Since we consider all account details sensitive personal information, I'll need you to fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in order to start the process of resetting your password. 

Our accounts team will be able to help you soon!
